info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 8 at 4:43AM CDT until August 8 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Grand Forks ND
info.description:
TORFGF
The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Clay County in northwestern Minnesota... Eastern Norman County in northwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... Mahnomen County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Becker County in northwestern Minnesota...
* Until 515 AM CDT.
* At 442 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms capable of producing both tornadoes and extensive straight line wind damage were located along a line extending from Fertile to near Ulen, moving east at 45 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* Locations impacted include... Fosston, Mahnomen, Fertile, Twin Valley, McIntosh, Ulen, and Erskine.
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 5:15 AM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 5:15 AM CDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

area.areaDesc: Becker, MN; Clay, MN; Mahnomen, MN; Norman, MN; Polk, MN

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 5:15 AM CDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 5:15 AM CDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.

area.areaDesc: Becker, MN; Clay, MN; Mahnomen, MN; Norman, MN; Polk, MN
